name: Potion Panic! (JonahPlusPlus)
description:
You have been poisoned and have 3 minutes left to live! Find the legendary Golden Heart to save yourself! But beware of those who came before you seeking the treasure...


Controls InputOutputA/DLeft/Right
SpaceJumpLeft ControlSlamW/S or Scroll Wheel
Change Potion
E or Left Click
Throw Potion
